info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 07 at 5:20PM EDT until August 07 at 6:00PM EDT by NWS Greenville-Spartanburg
info.description: The National Weather Service in Greenville-Spartanburg has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Cabarrus County in the Piedmont of North Carolina... Davie County in the Piedmont of North Carolina... Eastern Iredell County in the Piedmont of North Carolina... Northern Mecklenburg County in the Piedmont of North Carolina... Rowan County in the Piedmont of North Carolina... * Until 600 PM EDT. * At 519 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 8 miles south of Yadkinville to 3 miles south of Mocksville to 4 miles west of Salisbury to 3 miles south of Downtown Concord, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect considerable tree damage. Damage is likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. * Locations impacted include... Huntersville, Kannapolis, Downtown Concord, Salisbury, Mocksville, Northeast Charlotte, West Concord, Cornelius, Mooresville and Davidson. TORNADO...POSSIBLE THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 900 PM EDT for the Piedmont of North Carolina. This is a DANGEROUS SITUATION. These storms are producing widespread wind damage across Rowan, Iredell, and northern Mecklenburg counties. SEEK SHELTER NOW inside a sturdy structure and stay away from windows! Please report damaging winds, hail, or flooding to the National Weather Service by calling toll free, 1, 800, 2 6 7, 8 1 0 1, or by posting on our Facebook page, or Tweet it using hashtag nwsgsp. Your message should describe the event and the specific location where it occurred.
